RelatedSentence: Bodog signed as Official Asian Betting Partner to Arsenal FC in August 2013 and would like to congratulate the club on a fantastic FA Cup win .
Arsenal fans were treated to one of the best finals of recent years and Bodog hired cinemas all across Asia to allow fans to enjoy special screenings of the match .
